about.welcomeMessage: Hello, my name is Walison Ribeiro, a self-taught full stack developer passionate about technology, especially in the field of programming.
about.education: I graduated as a Systems Development Technician and I am currently in the {{semester}} semester of Computer Science üë®‚Äçüíª.
about.projects: Since 2018, I have been studying and creating web, software, mobile, and hardware projects with Arduino. What I value the most in my code is organization and testing.
about.community: I love the developer community and how everyone can contribute to the development of our applications. So let's contribute reciprocally, connect with me on
about.MartinFowler: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand
